thread.title: Hailey Baldwin, and Anwar Hadid walk at NYFW
thread.title_full: Hailey Baldwin, Bella and Anwar Hadid walk at NYFW | Daily Mail Online

author: Stephanie Haney At Dailymail.com
title: Hailey Baldwin, and Anwar Hadid walk at NYFW
text:
It's the fashion house's platinum anniversary and they've pulled out all the stops.
Zadig & Voltaire showed their latest collection at New York Fashion Week on Monday.
And the Parisian contemporary brand sent Hailey Baldwin and siblings Bella and Anwar Hadid down the runway to do it.
Triple threat: Zadig & Voltaire showed their latest collection at New York Fashion Week on Monday and sent Hailey Baldwin and siblings Bella and Anwar Hadid down the runway to do it
Hailey, 20, was bundled up in weather-appropriate wear, donning a double-breasted jacket with an elaborate bird design embroidered on one side. Red satin lining peaked out from the ends of her rolled up sleeves.
Her red, blue and black printed sweater and ankle-grazing pants were mostly hidden under the loose-fitting overcoat.
The seasoned model wore edgy black heels on foot, featuring subtle silver spikes on straps that crisscrossed over the top of her feet and around her ankle.
Bundled up: Hailey, 20, was bundled up in weather-appropriate wear, donning a double-breasted jacket with an elaborate bird design embroidered on one side
Zadig & Voltaire brought Bella back into the mix for their Fall/Winter 2017 collection, afer calling her their 'new muse' for this year's Spring/Summer line.
The runway staple wore fit-to-flare leather pants in black, white and red that stopped at her ankles with the same tough-looking heel as Hailey.
The 20-year-old face of the Young Love issue of Teen Vogue wore an electric blue turleneck under a roomy, black boat neck sweater. The Victoria's Secret Angel's thumbs popped through holes at the end of the turtleneck sleeves, with black polish lining the bottom of her thumb nails as she rested her hands lightly in her pants pockets.
Recurring role: Zadig & Voltaire brought Bella back into the mix for their Fall/Winter 2017 collection, afer calling her their 'new muse' for this year's Spring/Summer line
She's electric! The runway staple wore fit-to-flare leather pants in black, white and red that stopped at her ankles with the same tough-looking heel as Hailey
The only son of Yolanda Foster and younger brother of Bella, 17-year-old Anwar walked the catwalk in layers on layer on layers.
He had on a black and white striped shirt under an orange camouflage dress shirt with zipper detail, topped off with an orange and black plaid jacket.
Pink fabric accented with fringed extended over his hands, where he also sported black nail polish on his thumbs.
Sibling rivarly: The only son of Yolanda Foster and younger brother of Bella, 17-year-old Anwar walked the catwalk in layers on layer on layers
Founded by Thierry Gillier in 1997, the French advanced contemporary brand is celebrating its 20th anniversary this year.
The brand has become known for its ready-to-wear jeans, boots and leather jackets, according to Vogue Paris .
Thierry is the grandson of the late Andre Gillier, who was the co-founder of Lacoste.
Platinum anniversary: Founded by Thierry Gillier in 1997, the French advanced contemporary brand is celebrating its 20th anniversary this year
Pretty in floral: Helena Christiansen rocked a cute dress and leather jacket for the event
Fashionista: Olivia Palermo rocks a monochrome look at the lavish fashion show
Moel pose: (L-R) Lottie Moss, Gabriel-Kane Day-Lewis and Elizabeth Sulcer
